content: Fun and addicting
Good solo player....and thats about it.

The game can be fun to play, but I have had it freeze on me a number of times which is disappointing. But, an even bigger issue is that Brettspielwelt placed RECURRING charges for this game on my credit card. I bought this as an app for my phone. It is not a subscription so I cannot understand how or why this was done. I also cannot seem to stop it so I am now left arguing my case with my credit card company.
Good game, although it would be great if it had a multi-player option
Fun roll and write. Good time waster.
Terrible flaw! If you hit the back button for your device, it exits the game and you lose all progress in the current game! Terrible!

One of my favorite board game/dice game! It's lovely that you can play it on your phone when traveling plus saves space. But honestly I would expect from a 3euros app purchase that it has something more like: pass the phone to play with friends or online multiplayer or both eventually. And finaly when playing on a phone it feels very small (like if it was made for a tablet) why not make it playable in portrait mode ?

If you don't know how to play this game do not purchase the app, the rules explanations are really bad. The game itself is very good, but if you enjoy the game most likely you won't pay again to play it on your phone, and if you want extra challenges you need to pay more... I regret having purchased this.
Smooth and easy

Game is much funner in person. App is disappointing, no pass and play, online or even number of player settings. Needs an undo button. The dice rolls don't seem random. If any of the features mentioned above were included the app would likely be worth the money. As it is now, I wouldn't buy again and wouldn't recommend.
Fun game. Sometimes not sure the number refilling is not random. The number of times I he rerolled a 1 three times in a row....

As gameplay goes, this is one of the most addictive games out there. BUT, this seems like a lost opportunity to make an absolute classic. Lack of multiplayer option (just comparing your score to others in solo mode is not enough) and a problematic interface. For the price of this app I expected more. The actual boardgame is not so much more expensive than this.
I wish it had a pass & play option, or an online option.
replyContent: Hi Jeremy, you can play the game against other players on BrettspielWelt https://m.brettspielwelt.de/

content: Needs an online play
replyContent: You can play the game against other players on BrettspielWelt https://m.brettspielwelt.de/

content: Great game. Would love to see an online mode, but happy with what there is.
replyContent: You can play the game against other players on BrettspielWelt https://m.brettspielwelt.de/

content: It's OK. The only way to learn the rules is via the rulebook. How to use the interface is just trial and error. Some sort of clue when you touch a particular area would have been much more helpful. Only 3 games in but still unsure as to how I score or what will happen if I choose a given action.
A great implementation, if only single player. However, achievements don't seem to register.
I like this game. But I can't change settings and it makes this annoying "hee-hee" sound. You can't pause a game, or go back to a game you were playing.

This is a quick ,fun,challenging game that I love to play while I'm waiting for anything.Doctors visits, long lines,or any time you want time to pass quickly.It is easy to learn and understand.I wish you could play against another person in the app.We do have a physical version, but you can play it anywhere on the phone and it would be nice to play together.
Such a gun game... we need multiplayer and then it would be perfect!

Das Spiel Ganz schön clever ist einfach super und das kommt auch in der App durch, auch wenn diese ziemlich lieblos gemacht ist. Die Steuerung ist umständlich, die Zurücktaste von Android wird nicht unterstützt, was dazu führt, dass die App direkt beendet wird. Während des Spiels kann man auch nicht ins Menü, da sonst die Partie ebenfalls endet. Cloudsync gibt es natürlich auch nicht. Die Soundeffekte nerven nach fünf Minuten. Eine Rückgängig-Taste gibt es auch nicht. Für drei Euro zu wenig.
Great in every aspect
Seamless gameplay to learn the moves and mechanisms. Simple controls. Pretty straightforward.
Superb implementation. Replaces the physical game completely.
Great game and good implementation

The game is amazing, but once I am in the game I can neither change any settings nor restart the game or go back. Additionally, an undo button would be nice, as touch screens do sometimes register the touch on a neighbouring field, which is sad and combined with the lacks stated before, a little annoying. I would largely appreciate a change!
I'm still learning the game, and it seems fun; but it seems weird that it's only solo. There should be an option to at least pass and play. It would probably be 5 stars if it had that.
Great game once you figure it out. Definitely worth the price

All in all, a great game and well worth the cost, even if it's only solo. As others have said, I would love to see a multi-player mode (even just local!). Also, an undo function would be fantastic for when I fat finger a selection!
UI is bare minimum, to the point that it is harder to learn than it should be. No frills at all, like animated dice or anything. It is functional, but bare minimum implementation of the game.
Brilliant game which is quick to learn but takes ages to master - yes there's an element of luck but there's also using probabilities Gear fun
It's the perfect game. I'll give it five stars if they include a feature to automatically show you each section's score as you play the game.
Enjoyable quick little brain teaser on optimizing bonuses and points for chains
Good quick game.
Very good game, nice app, but doesn't save all of your scores. Only once in awhile does it add the score to your recent games list.
Quick pick up and play roll and write with choices to make. Getting late game combos is the bomb!

It has been a lot of fun. Played dozens of times. Only problem, only 1 in 3 games save into my history or high scores. Doesn't effect how good the game is, just like to see all my scores or personal best registered on my own high scores.
Great game, but the Dec 2019 update has totally broken the app. Didn't recognize my email, pushed ads, now doesn't even load a game. Update: Problems have been fixed.
replyContent: Hi Joseph, please give the actual version a new try. We have updated our servers and everything should work fine.

content: Fun game with good replayability. Well implemented.
Good game, but cannot rate the game higher until they add multiplayer
replyContent: Hi Robyn, the game concept was to have a game to play it fast and everywhere at every time. You can play the game with other players online at https://m.brettspielwelt.de/

content: Although I played Twice As Clever first and enjoy it more, I couldn't get enough, so I purchased That's So Clever as well. I love it for the quick play, the strategy, replayability, and fun. Such a great set of games with amazing design.

Great app,an update for multiplayer, either by internet or by pass and play would make this even better.But I have found a bug. At the moment you have ended your round and before you press the arrow to see the dice of the ai that you can pick, if you have any rerolls left and you touch the screen in the exact space the reroll button is positioned(not visible now)you do reroll the dice although there are of course no dice since your turn is over( you even get the sound effect of rolling the dice)
Played the boxed game, and enjoyed it so much, I got the mobile game. Fun to play. Try it...you'll like it...
It's a fine game. However, it's gotten wonky and often won't load after the landing screen. IMPROVED.
This is a really fun game. I've been playing it quite a bit since I got it.

It's a really good game if you like roll and writes. It's simple to pick up and play. The only problem I have that makes it really suck is you cant set the number of computer players and you can't play multiplayer. Neither online or locally.
Clever as a fox!
Rules are terribly written! I read them several times, and I'm not quite sure I have fully understood them.
replyContent: Hi Ricardo, I am very sorry we did such a bad job writing a condensed version of the rules. Please refer to the original game rules which you can find online in the iNet

content: I figured out what is going on with the leaderboard issue (mentioned in my prior post) - Challenge 2 stats are being saved to the leaderboard for Challenge 1

A brilliant game. The only downside is that it still doesn't save games and achievements if you are offline. *** I just tried playing offline and that score is not showing on the Your Last Games list ***
replyContent:
Hi Dolly,
we fixed the problem of not saving the score if you are offline. Hope you have no more problems anymore.

content: Update seems to have fixed crashing. Good game.
replyContent:
Hi Alex,
if the problem persists in the new version 2.2.5 please contact me by email, so we could narrow down and solve the problems you face.

content: I love the physical version of this when playing with other players. I'm enjoying the app a lot but don't find single player quite as entertaining as I thought I would. The app is a well designed version of a great dice game though.
No matter what I try, the app stays offline, so playing alone gets boring pretty quick.
Quite enjoyable. The feature to go to the main menu from the current game would be appreciated.
Great game. The reroll is broken. Half the time I use a reroll, it comes up with the exact same numbers on all 6 dice, a statistical improbability.
Good game , sadly no multiplayer
Why haven't you made this (and doppelt?) multi-player?
Great game, even better than the original. Games are quicker than the dic4 and paper version, choices are hard, we get new challenges. It's all around awesome.
replyContent: The new update should solve this startup problem.

content: Excellent. Love this so much I've now purchased the physical version. 👍 The only negative is the rules aren't very clear. But it wasn't difficult to find a full version of these online. Boardgame geek website is helpful. Now I just need to figure out how to score above 250!

Update: The error was fixed. The app itself is quite fun. Unfortunately the user interface lacks basic features and standard behaviour. For example the Back-Button immediately quits the app and cancel game progress. There is no way to resume or pause or cancel or restart a running game. Ideal behaviour: Tapping Back sends you to the main menu while saving the game state. Then u could continue or restart from the main menu. Original: App is broken. A new game won't start at all anymore.
replyContent:
Hi Tobias,
hope your problem is fixed with the new version 2.2.5. Please let us know and/or re-rate.

content: Almost never works. Stuck at gray screen. Please refund Edit: so far the game started normally. That is great. Now only the achievements should be fixed ( does not match high score at all) and this challange 2 should be explained before having to pay
replyContent:
Hi Hans,
please try the new version 2.2.5 and let us know if it works now for you. We tested the game on Galaxy S9 and couldn't see any problems there.

content: What can I say? It's a great game with a great customer support service. I had a problem, they fixed it and they let me know. Now the app runs perfect. 5 stars well deserved. Bravo! Old review: "It's an awesome game but the app constantly crashes.when they fix it I will change my review too."
replyContent: Hi Juan, hope the new version 2.2.5 will do the job. Otherwise please contact us at alex@brettspielwelt.de so we can try to find the problems you face.

content: Game frequently hangs when trying to start a game Hard killing it and reopening the app doesn't always fix it. Game froze when I was 90% the way through. I also wish there was a mode for 3 or 4 players (even if they were AIs) Pixel 3 XL Edit: played 4 times. 3/4 times the game freezes in the middle of the last round with no way to recover. Infuriating.
replyContent: The update should fix the startup problems. Hope you can enjoy the game more then.

content: Love the game but am stuck in offline mode. Have tried a thousand times to enter my email but to no avail. The few times I've gone online the last month and I play an amazing game, it is not registered as I've gone offline during the game... Same problem with the other version of the game as well. Makes it less fun to actually play. Have tried to uninstall and install again but no luck at all. Fix the bugs and you have a fun game I could play forever!
replyContent: Hello Petra, please try to clear the memory/cache of the app (in settings / apps) or try to uninstall the app and reinstall it again. If you have problems connecting to you "old" account please contact us at alex@brettspielwelt.de

content: Great adaptation! I just wish there were a multiplayer mode so my friends and I could play together. If it had that feature, it's easily be a 5 star game!

Poorly designed app. Frequently fails to record scores; so, high and average score tallies are meaningless. Fails to log completed achievements; games played to fulfill specific achievements are a waste of time. The app is very rudimentary and clunky; user interface is subpar, below even many free apps. No undo option. Gameplay is static and monotonous; no variability because there is only one play mode. No AI opponents, no pass and play option; not even challenges or puzzles. Waste of money.
replyContent: Hi Matt, we had some Server issues, which we have solved now. Definitely better now. Please try and give feedback if you like.

content: I enjoy the game when it launches, but it almost never does. It'll take me to the splash screen, but when I click play I get an empty screen with just a background. Clicking back, exits the app. Avoid until it's fixed.
replyContent: Hi Dean, hope your bug is fixed in version 2.2.5. Please let us know and/or re-rate the app.

content: Needs multiplayer and pass n play. Big issue with me, huge.
wont start
replyContent: Please try the new version 2.2.5 which could solve your problems. If it does not work, please conact us at alex@brettspielwelt.de so we could solve the problem.

content: Cost 5$ and the game is poorly design. I refunded the game for the main reason that there is no options. -You play against 1 AI and there is no way to play against 2 or 3. -You can't back from a game with the arrow in the bottom of the phone or the game close. -When a phone game cost 5$ don't put ads about other games that you own in it... Otherwise the game itself is awesome.
Awful, How Do I Even Play?
Brilliant little brain teaser. And probably more accessible than the physical version.

Edit: Lowered my score as they have updated the game not to fix the bugs but add dlc which flashes with a massive arrow in the middle of the screen every time you load up. Great game, scummy mobile developer.
Game stalls going from menu to the launching the game intermittently. Otherwise faithful rendition of the game. Wish it had a undo button to take back a choice.

The game is great. Love it. The program is garbage. It has forgotten who I am. So if I log online my email is unknown yet if I start a new account my name is already taken. Of course it is... By me!!! Very frustrated that I cannot Post high scores or compete online
replyContent:
Hi Bruce,
there has been a problem by google which "destroyed" some kind of persistent data. Sadly this bug hits our App. But we could help you connect back your account. Please send an email to alex@brettspielwelt.de.

content: Great game. Clunky implementation. The actual game works nicely. It's only single player though so removed the ability to play with friends on a play and pass format. The main problem is the menus. The user login is flaky. If you're not online, it doesn't save your stats rendering then useless if you are ever offline. It's a shame.
replyContent:
Hi Liam,
Your scores and game data will be saved until the next time you have access to the inet, then it will be saved.

content: I enjoy the game, but after playing about 100 games, I've lost my achievements and high scores, so annoying

No possibility of playing online or as multiplayer (even if against computers/robots) - unless I've missed something. Therefore, in my opinion not worth the cost, and it should be free. This game is a lot of fun, but with other people. I personally do not want to pay for an offline game. Sorry.
One day the app no longer recognized my email address so I uninstalled it.
Game is pretty fun and addictive. Wish there was a way to save my high score, though. Don't really care what others' best scores are. Otherwise pretty cool.
Highly addictive
Very good game once you get to grips with the rules. The in-game rules are poorly written/translated and the app badly needs a tutorial. It also needs AI opponents.
Fun game, but I wish I could play with others
Great Game

I give 4 stars from 3 because you promised to add support for SD card installation. But I will only give 5 stars if you add multiplay on one device. It would be perfect for 2 people to play while travelling together in the train or bus.
replyContent:
Hi,

we will add support for the SD_Card installation with the next update.

content: Single player only. No AI opponents, online multiplayer or pass and play multiplayer. My wife and I wanted to play together. :( I feel like that should have been mentioned on the product page. Refunded after two games.
replyContent: Sorry to hear, you expecterd something different. We will look at our description how to make it better. You ca also use m.brettspielwelt.de for multiplayer games.

content: Super addicting, in the best way. Every time I play, I want to try new strategies and go for new bonuses!
Login is broken, I login on my phone, and the same login doesn't work on my tablet. So I have to start over with a new account.
Great game!
Nice addictive implementation of the classic table top roll and play game. The rules could be better written.
It is indeed very clever
Feels just like the table top game!
Single player only. No pass and play? No online play? What did i buy?

Poorly thought-out app. It has no tutorial just a list of rules but these can only be read from the main menu not in the game. I found the game unplayable because I couldn't use the app to work out how to play the game
replyContent:
Hi Calum,
so you would have liked to have an tutorial or would ingame help for the specific actions been most helpful?

content: Excellent gameplay, but the design need to be more appealing...
Crashes every couple of minutes
replyContent: Hi Jon, please try the newest version. Everything should work without crashes as it is tested with an Xperia Z5. Otherwise please contact us via email. alex@brettspielwelt.de

content: Best board game app in my opinion. Perfect for filling a few minutes (or more). People complain that the game can be solved but I've played pretty frequently for over a year now and still don't feel close to cracking the order of actions. Maybe I'm dumb, your milage may very 😂
Great implementation of the game. Solo only however, no AI or multiplayer.
I was getting very regular crashes before I gave up. Kinda hard to enjoy with this much trouble in stability.
replyContent: We released a new version yesterday. Hopefully that will help you!

content: Great game, quick to pick up and play, highly rated
crashes on some phones. a lot

Ah geez, looks like login / registration / linking account issues are back for Android users.  After loading app, the screen says I'm Offline and I can't get it to change back to online.  Entering my e-mail in the link account field does nothing.  Very frustrating!
replyContent: Unfortunately we had some server trouble during the weekend 17.8./18.8. Everything should be running smoothly since then. We also released a new version fixing problems with the highscore and achievements after a loss of connection.

content: German Roll and Write very fun, give the tutorial sone time, or find a youtube video that explains it a bit better if you still dont get the rules.

The app wouldn't register a new account, and wouldn't recognize the account I then made on their website. Just said it couldn't recognize my email (sure i typed it right), and when i tried using the account name I registered, it complained that it was already in use.
replyContent:
Hi,

you can not use your  BSW account here. Just register a new nickname and optionally link it to an email for use on other devices or in  "Twice as clever".

content: Wonderful game that translates very well to technology. My only suggestion would be a reset button, for when I make silly mistakes and I'd rather start a new game!
Good game. Slightly clunky implementation.
Playing this on paper with friends is amazing and the app amazingly conveys this feeling in digital.
This is exceptionally great timewaster, the only improvements it needs is are AI and/or async multiplayer mode.
needs better rules interaction

Good port of great physical game. Like others a bit frustrated at the bugs: switching away to another app resets progress, stats bot updating correctly, timestamps off. Also x-1 in challenge 2 would be better expressed -x I think.

Love the game, but the app absolutely refuses to accept my email address. I entered a new address for Ganz 1, & somehow it worked. Installed Ganz 2, now neither app will accept the address I JUST ENTERED!!! Good thing the game is fun solo, because online play is totally broken.
replyContent: Wir hatten ein Problem mit der Case-Sensivität. Das ist nun gelöst. Einfach bitte noch einmal probieren die in Teil 1 verknüpfte Mail in Teil 2 einzugeben und  dies dann mit dem zu gesandten Code bestätigen!.

content: Das Spiel selbst ist sehr gut umgesetzt. Allerdings funktionieren die Achievements und die Registrierung einer E-Mail-Adresse nicht, was ärgerlich ist, da ich dann meinen Namen nicht auch für "doppelt so cclever" verwenden kann.

Game plays well, but very frustrating that most of your scores never get tracked! Part of the fun is repeat play to better your score and get the achievements, but you can't effectively do this. Also seems to be offline mode only, and the mysterious Challenge 2 that is a paid unlock, but no details of what it actually is. A missed opportunity.
Great game. But app doesn't save results of all my games. I think I played about 100 games and only 41 of them was saved in Statistics. And I don't get achievements because of it.
very good
Love the game but can't seem to get online with it.
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: Fun game, have a physical copy as well. The app is not bad, but not great either. The achievements don't work properly. And it could be made more colorblind friendly (blue & purple and orange & green are difficult to tell apart). Would like to have online multiplayer.
replyContent:
We  released a new version  yesterday fixing problems with the highscore and achievements after a loss of connection.
Now  your scores will be submitted once the conncection is back.

content: excellent addictive

A fun game with a few issues! Dice rolls seem scripted at times. Rerolls often yield the same dice value, and on the last roll, the white and purple die often are the same value, limiting +1 chains. Also, the game occasionally losses my progress requiring me to start over, and my purchased content keeps needing to be restored. It's worth the current $3 price if you dont mind the above mentioned issues. And if these issues are addressed, and a local multiplayer added, this is a 5⭐ for me.
Needs to record offline scores in 'statistics' to get that last star.
good implementation of the game. I would add a running total to the orange and purple areas, though.
Great game but doesn't store all my scores. lost two great scores from my stats. now lost 2 more games. terrible. why does it keep not recording my plays? so frustrating. I've paid for this game.
Fun, addictive game. Nice combo of mostly thinking with a bit of luck. The rules are a little lacking but playing the game and re-visiting the rules 2or 3 times was all I needed.
The game is fantastic, and the app plays just fine, but there are too many times it doesn't record my score. Pretty frustrating to put up a great score and not have it tracked...
fun game, but can't play online. please help
The game is really fun, but I can't play online. It's always offline. I cannot see any way to get online.
online fixed so changing my review to 5 stars. great game and app.
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: This was a great app but a recent update makes it terrible. It used to be colourblind friendly but now it is completely unplayable!!! Response: I used to be able to see the difference between the coloured dice but now I can't since the dice where changed to look more 3D - especially the blue and purple dice are no longer distinguishable at all. The other three non-white dice are also too similar now. Before the update there was enough contrast between the colours to identify each easily.
replyContent:
Hi,
what exactly is now worse than before?

content: Yay, account registration is fixed but still a bit wonky. Once you put an email address in, if it's not found there's no way to restart the reg process without force closing. The game itself works fine.
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: I love this game! But the last update made it so I can't get online.
Very good dice game, I love it! What the hell is challenge 2? There is no information about it in the game!
The solo game is good. That's it. unable to create a new account as having same issue as previous reviews.
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: Just paid to download the app, because I wanted to play online. Just like other reviewers are saying, not able to register nor login, so forced to play offline. Dear makers, can you let us know when it's about to be fixed?
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: Unable to register. I registered on the app but it's not reflecting on the app. I could only play in the offline mode. Can someone help me please?
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: I'd give this five stars except that Challenge 2 doesn't seem to be accessible on my device. Does it require an in-app purchase? A "buy" button appears but it doesn't do anything. Do you have to attain a certain "level" of proficiency in your statistics? I seem to be at a roadblock in terms of accessing Challenge 2.
replyContent:
Hi Bob,

once you click the yellow star with the lock symbol, a dialog should appear on top of the screen. Just clicking buy there will normally trigger the inapp purchase. No specific score or achievement is needed.
We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration, which were based on problems with the network communication.

content: Fun game true to the physical copy but cannot play it as anything but Offline because the registration not working. I enter a name and press okay and "Register New Account..." appears but nothing happens. Please fix so I can vote this a 5 star
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: i can play only in offline. when trying to give myself a name it just says "register new account.." and nothing happens. could you please fix this problem?
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: Cannot register. Can only 'add my name' to play offline. No highscores... Shame because its a lovely app of a game I own.
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: i can't register my email or play online. why ?
replyContent: We fixed the problems with the login and the email registration. Sorry for the inconveniences.

content: suuuper
Great game until recent update/upgrade. Now the game annimation is painfully slow on a Fire HD 10. Hope it gets fixed soon.

Love the game, looks like Challenge-2 introduces a new learning curve, which should be fun. BUT the notation on the Orange "x-1" spots is wrong. "x-1" implies that putting in a 6 would result in a score of 5. Correct notation would be "-x" [or -(x) for math geeks, or (x) for accounting nerds].
replyContent: Ja das stimmt leider. In Analogie zu den anderen Multiplikatoren steht x hier für mal und nicht für die Zufallsvariable X des Würfelergebnisses. Alle Alternativen wie x(-1) oder -X (dann doch als Variable) wären entweder noch verwirrender oder inkonsequent. Daher sind wir bei dieser Darstellung geblieben.

content: Great game and fun to play!
its fun, but i just wish i could plsy with other people.
replyContent: You can play online at m.brettspielwelt.de against other people. We think for the app the indirect compotition via the highscores is more fitting.

content: No way to register a new account. No multiplayer. The UI is unclear. They shoe horned in the singleplayer version of the game behind an app that doesnt even have a clear main menu, or a working avatar creation. maybe I will reconsider after the app is complete.
replyContent:
Hi Dan,
 
we found the problems with the registration. Sorry it took us so long, it was complicated and device (android) dependent. Now it works properly.

content: A fun game that is true to the physical version.

Love this!  I downloaded the rules to the physical game, though, because the app rules were too vague to really figure out how the game played.  Very true to the physical game, except for one thing: the rules in the boxed game state that no Actions can be used in the Passive Player Role for Solo Play, and the app allows me to use my +1 Actions.  Not complaining, mind you, it's just the only discrepancy I noticed.  ;-)
online function does not work anymore
cant register or login to an account.
replyContent:
Hi David,

we do not know about any problems with the regstrations process. what exactly went wrong?

content: I like the game but it wo t install on my Samsung tablet. I have to keep opening it from the Google play store
replyContent:
Hello Penny,
the game itself runs, but you miss the app icon to start it directly without going to the store?

Normally there should be an list of all installed apps where you can choose which apps shoud be placed where on your home screen.

content: How do I get multiplayer?
Solid game.. Enjoying it
Nice to try different strategies. 12 minutes per game. Addictive.

It's a huge problem that the app completely resets (losing the current game) if you hit the home button or let your device fall asleep. Edit: after an update the app works better but still wipes your game if the phone goes to sleep.
replyContent: Sorry if you had trouble with that. We updated the game and the problem does no longer exists. Would be nice if you reconsider your rating.

content: lots of fun
best
Great implementation of a clever and fun dice game. (You'll earn the other star when I can easily use one account for all my devices, with synced scores and achievements.)

Great dice game. I go through a lot of issues but remember that I still give it five stars. The app itself has a lot of shortcomings; scores don't update until you relaunch the app, date and time info is off, learn to play instructions are awful, woohoo sound is corny, no multiplayer/online play. All that considered, the game itself is well implemented and downright fascinating to play. I'm hooked. Just find a YouTube learn to play video cuz the in-game instructions are discouragingly bad.

Decently good app of a great game.  My only issue is when I hit my home button to send a quick text, and then reopened the app, my game reset and I lost all progress.  Keep in mind, I'm not closing the app, just switching windows.   Very disappointing when I lost my progress in a game I was doing very well at!  Edit:  Just tied my best score yet, but the app won't show it in the statistics.  It's as if it never happened.  Very disappointed yet again.  Normally, I wouldn't complain about these type of things if the app was free, but this was a paid app, this could and should be better.
Good port but missing a pass and play option.
The included rules aren't super helpful your first play, but aftera few goes it just clicks and suddenly I've lost my afternoon to rolling dice on my phone...
It really is a pretty clever dice game. One of my new favorites.
Rules are a little hard to get at first due to poor translation, but very fun after figuring it out.
Solid game. Well worth the purchase.
awesome roll and write game would be nice if they had a multiplayer pass and play or ai
All is good but 2 things are amiss. 1. If I missclick, there is no undo action. Please put an undo action on the Placement options. 2. AI for an offline game with 1-4 player's ? Is this possible?

Great game implemented just ok. First ONLY SOLO VESION is supported. Second mutlitasking isn't well supported , after taking a call from an anothed app , game sometimes resets and progress is lost - it is possible to finish the game in one sitting , but resuming the game could be a great feature. Third - small nuisances and bugs - SFX - reroll button sometimes uses 2 rerolls instead of one - second reroll  SHOULD wait until results of fist reroll is shown etc.

Picked this up after hearing a review on 'Mile High Game Guy's board gaming 
podcast. So addictive and fun! Played like a thousand times already. 
Current high score: 268. Great game try it for yourself.

Love the game. App needs a bit of work, though. I would like to see local 
high scores, 2 player gameplay, a button to allow you to exit to main 
screen while in game. Another feature I would like to see is if there was 
an option to use this app as a score sheet to be used with rolling actual 
physical dice. I put together a set of dice in required colors. Who doesn't 
like rolling dice?

Wow this is good. Never played the physical version, but the app version is pretty well done.  The underlying game is stellar.  I usually don't play multiplayer games on my phone, anyway, so single player is fine for me.

Really addictive, fun timewaster. Too bad I've had my highscores and 
achievements disappear several times now, very frustrating.

I like it a lot. Feels a little unpolished, but the gameplay is stellar. I 
wish the English translation was a little better. Would also like a 
personal stats page (games played, personal best, personal average, 
best/worst each category, etc). Just a wishlist, not a complaint. Game is 
still great fun.

Could not find a very needed undo button. Also, on switching between apps 
in the middle of the game, returning to the app have reset my game!! Very 
frustrating.

Great game but PLEASE add a local leaderboard so we can track our best 
scores. The numbers in the achievements don't appear to be quite right and 
don't make sense to us non-German speakers.
replyContent: Thanks for the voting, local leaderboard is a great idea. We are working on improved achievements and some kind of tournament.

content: Love it, please add pass and play and cross plat asynchronous play

Highly addictive, will buy the English version of the actual game when it's 
available. Hopefully they can figure out multiplayer (even just pass and 
play). Also during the passive turn (after you've selected your three dice 
for the turn), there should be some indication that this is what's going 
on, such as a dice roll animation. Otherwise it's a bit too subtle a change 
(the dice changes and the platter gets a green highlight, but there's no 
sound or other visual cue). Just putting it out there because the developer 
seems super responsive to feedback.
replyContent: Thanks for your rating and suggestions. We will try to implement a better visualisation for the passive round.

content:
Absolutely brilliant game. Perfectly encapsulates the physical game. The 
only thing I'd ask to include is a statistics page where I could see all of 
my best scores?
replyContent: Statistics have now been implemented in the current version.

content:
Great game. Interface looks very amateur-y, and the lack of a mute button 
(or a settings panel in general) is annoying.
replyContent: Thanks for the comment. We are working on improvements. The sound toggle Button will be available from 1.2.7 onwards.

content: The devs have since fixed my issues in the previous version. Thank you!
replyContent: Sorry, we had some Server issues. Registration should run as normal now. Please give it a try, and see if achievements and Highscores will work again.

content:
The game for now is solitaire only, and it is only partially translated 
English. That said, the controls are sensible, it runs fast and lean, the 
graphics are colorful and presented well (they wisely recreated the 
physical player pad), and the interface isn't too cluttered. This game is a 
brain burner, and if you like roll-and-write style games this is a good 
challenge.

It's a very tricky but fun and addicting game. I've had no issues on my 
Galacy S7 or my Galaxy Tab 4. Glad this game exists as an app!

It is a barebones version of the dice game. No multiplayer, rules section 
is incomplete, and a general level of jank that makes it look amateur at 
best. The game itself is really fun, though.
replyContent: Yes it is the "simple" SingleUser Version of the Game, with Achievements and Highscoretracking. If a lot of people will use the App we will consider making updates for Multiplayer. Apart from that, the rules should be okay.

content:
Only 2p vs. 1 AI opponent. AI rolls are not seen and youre always left with 
1s and 2s!
replyContent: The App implements the Solo-Rules of "Ganz Schön Clever". Where there is no "AI" ... just the lowest numbers from the rolled dice are placed on the silver tray.

content:
The game never loads beyond the gray background graphic. Reloaded the game, 
restarted the phone, reinstalled the game and nothing happens. Using a 
Galaxy S5 phone.
replyContent: Sorry there were problems with Version 5 and 6 of Android, which we have fixed in Version 1.2.4. Hope you can now enjoy the game. Please let us know, if everything works fine now or if there are still things that need to be cleaned up.
